cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5.0)
project(SDL3imgui VERSION 0.1.0)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(SOURCES_IMGUI imconfig.h imgui.h imgui_impl_sdl3.h imgui_impl_sdlrenderer3.h imgui_internal.h imstb_rectpack.h imstb_textedit.h imstb_truetype.h imgui_draw.cpp imgui_impl_sdl3.cpp imgui_impl_sdlrenderer3.cpp imgui_tables.cpp imgui_widgets.cpp imgui.cpp imgui_demo.cpp)
add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} ${SOURCES_IMGUI})
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ SDL3::SDL3)
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC SDL3::SDL3)
